Privacy Policy - Trim Trello Chrome Extension

1. Introduction

This Privacy Policy describes how the Trim Trello Chrome Extension ("we," "our," or "us") collects, uses, and protects your information when you use our browser extension. We are committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring transparency about our data practices.

2. What is Trim Trello?

Trim Trello is a Chrome browser extension designed to enhance your Trello experience by allowing you to hide unwanted elements on Trello web pages. The extension provides a customizable interface to hide specific UI elements based on your preferences.

3. Information We Collect

3.1 User Preferences

We collect and store the following information locally on your device:

  • Your element hiding preferences (which Trello elements you choose to hide)
  • Custom CSS selectors you create to hide specific elements
  • Extension settings and configuration options

3.2 What We Do NOT Collect

We want to be clear about what we do not collect:

  • No personal information (names, emails, addresses)
  • No Trello account credentials or authentication data
  • No content from your Trello boards, cards, or lists
  • No browsing history outside of Trello.com
  • No analytics or tracking data

4. How We Use Your Information

The information we collect is used solely for:

  • Providing the core functionality of hiding elements on Trello
  • Remembering your preferences between browser sessions
  • Improving the user experience of the extension

5. Data Storage and Security

5.1 Local Storage

All your data is stored locally on your device using Chrome's built-in storage API. This means:

  • Your data never leaves your device
  • We cannot access your stored preferences
  • Your data is protected by Chrome's security measures

5.2 Data Security

We implement the following security measures:

  • All data is stored locally using Chrome's secure storage APIs
  • No data is transmitted to external servers
  • No third-party services have access to your information

6. Data Sharing and Third Parties

We do not share, sell, or rent your information to any third parties. Your data remains completely private and under your control.

7. Permissions and Access

The extension requires the following permissions to function properly:

  • Storage: To save your preferences locally on your device
  • Active Tab: To access the current Trello tab and apply your hiding preferences
  • Host Permissions: Limited to https://trello.com/* to only function on Trello websites

8. Your Rights and Choices

You have complete control over your data:

  • You can modify your preferences at any time through the extension popup
  • You can remove the extension at any time, which will delete all stored data
  • You can clear your data by uninstalling the extension

9. Children's Privacy

Our extension is not intended for use by children under the age of 13. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 13.

10. Changes to This Privacy Policy

We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page and updating the "Last Updated" date.

11. International Users

This extension is operated from the United States. If you are accessing it from outside the United States, please be aware that your information may be transferred to, stored, and processed in the United States where our servers are located.
